content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements the o christmas tree christmas stocking is 1 of 5 stockings designed for the 2019 christmas stocking crochet along this is a free event you can find all of the details on my blog here 2 **yarn ** lion brand yarn vanna s choice in kelly green was used for the sample stocking is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity & craftsy jennifer pionk all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2019 designed by jennifer pionk aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be com/o-christmas-tree-christmas-stocking-free-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //the faux fur christmas stocking is 1 of 5 stockings designed for the 2019 christmas stocking crochet along this is a free event you can find all of the details on my blog here yarn lion brand yarn go for faux in baked alaska and pomeranian were used for the stocking in the photos stocking is an a crocheted simplicity original
